name: ephero-monorepo
description: üîê Secure ephemeral sharing tool - Monorepo containing server, chrome extension, and web client

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:extension"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:web && npm run build:extension
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../web-client && npm install && cd ../chrome-extension && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:web && npm run test:extension
